articles.author: Tim Ross, Clea Caulcutt, Dan Bloom, Nette Nöstlinger
articles.title: Europe strains to give Trump an off-ramp on bombing Iran - politico.eu
articles.description: Germany, France and the U.K. prepare for talks with Iranian officials in Geneva. Can they stop Trump joining Israel’s war?
articles.content: Back in 2015, these same European powers  the so-called E3 played a major part in striking the last Iran nuclear deal, the Joint Comprehensive Plan of Action (JCPOA). But that was under Barack Obamas… [+1513 chars]
